WorkItem.Description:
I see the following on Rawr 2.3.12.  Ran through several iterations of expected and unexpected behavior for the Ashen Band of Endless Wisdom.
 
If I ctrl-click an empty item diamond (shows blue) then the optimizer ignores other gem options as expected.
 
If I first click (no ctrl) an empty item diamond (shows green) then ctrl-click the same diamond (shows blue), the optimizer does not ignore other gem options, as if the diamond was still green.
WorkItem.Summary: click item for green diamond then ctrl-click for blue diamond acts like green diamond

Comments.Message: The UI just doesn't have a way to indicate that it is both green and blue, which actually is a valid combination. We'll be redoing that whole UI when we get a chance.

I see.  This was driving me crazy, because I started with all green diamonds and then realized after reading the docs that they needed to be blue, yet they continued to act like green.  Thanks for the quick response.

Actually it does show it, if you have multiple gemmings in the lists. I'm guessing you turned it down to 1 gemming per the Edit Gem Templates dialog. If you had more than one you would see the blue diamond on the one you clicked and green on the rest. Just go unclick the green from the others and you are left with blue.
